item.title: Website Updates
item.text: So been working on my website this weekend and just pushed this to my website. It all looks pretty good :) ~~~~ The homepage might need some work, but that's a problem for another time. My website is now more Javascript than anything else according to Github, which is what I was going for as I wanted the most of it to be really easy to edit with XML files and all the HTML be handled by JS.

item.title: Rocket
item.text: Just finished up with my model rocket, the files are all on my github and I am SUPER PUMPED to launch it this week. The nosecone is just finishing up on the printer, so I just have to build the launchpad and install the engine.

item.title: Ender 3 Pro
item.text: I've been messing around with my printer the last few days, and have made a lot of progress. It took about 10 hours to build and level the bed, but now I've got it going really smoothly and have been running prints non-stop that I have been planning for the last while. Most of those files are on my github.

item.title: Funeral Music
item.text: PLEASE PLAY THIS SONG WHEN I DIE. Home - We're finally landing. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zR6fECxF44I

item.title: 3D Printer
item.text: MY ENDER 3 IS COMING THIS WEEKEND!!!!!! Shoutout to Tyler for agreeing to put up with me and help build it. The man is a freaking genius.

item.title: Model Rocket
item.text: Well. I'm printing my first model of the rocket I'm building. My tech design teacher let me use his printer, so I'm excited to launch that soon. I'm going to try launching it with an A class engine, just to see the height, and then I may go out and get a C class engine depending on how high it goes off the bat. My friend is giving me a few rocket engines to mess around with and text. Hopefully I can have it in the air by next week.

item.title: Websites
item.text: Websites. So rewarding. And a pain in the ass. I have probably spent 40 hours on my website version 3, and i just decided I really don't like it. Look at it. It's ugly. So I am resorting to a similar layout of my website version 2. Hopefully I can take everything I've learned and use it to make this one actually good.

item.title: Blog
item.text: So I guess this is my blog... welcome. (PS, hover to see the full blog content when its too big to view.)
